means: 使甲基化( methylate的过去式和过去分词 )

word_mean: 甲基化的：含甲基或与甲基化合的

sentence.Network_en: DNMT 1, in turn, reinforced HP 1 binding to methylated histones.
sentence.Network_cn: DNMT1可依次加强Hp1蛋白与甲基化组蛋白相结合.

sentence.Network_en: Beware of methylated alcohol, which is very poisonous, and should never be added to drinking water.
sentence.Network_cn: 要提防甲基化酒精, 那是剧毒的, 永远不能掺入饮用水.

sentence.Network_en: CpG - ODN , finding in bacteria, the oligodeoxynecleotides containing non - methylated CpG dinucleotides, has immune activation.
sentence.Network_cn: CpG -ODN 是一些发现于细菌中含有未甲基化的CpG二核苷酸对并且具有免疫激活作用的寡核苷酸.
